text: Ooyala is a 1998 Telugu drama film directed by S. V. Krishna Reddy, starring Srikanth, Ramya Krishna, Nassar and Suhasini in the lead roles. It is the remake of the Malayalam movie Irattakuttikalude Achan. This film is about a couple sacrificing one of their twins to another childless couple. The music for this film was well received by the audience. ==Cast== * Srikanth * Ramya Krishna * Nassar * Suhasini * S. P.
